10 Best Blogs for Bioinformatics

by Corey
~1 min read December 25, 2015

Categories

  • articles

Tags

  • Bioinformatics

There are some marvelous bioinformatics blogs you definitely want to follow. Plus, no particular rank in my list. You may found that only 9 blogs in list. Am I a math idiot? No, I just gave some spare for myself. -_-

Personal

  1. Lior Pachter - Bits of DNA
  2. Russ Altman - Confidence
  3. Jason Moore - Epistasis Blog
  4. Pawel Szczesny - Circle of Complexity
  5. Pierre Lindenbaum - YOKOFAKUN
  6. Neil Saunders - What You’re Doing is Rather Desperate
  7. Jan Aerts - Saaien Tist

Public

  1. RNA-Seq Blog
  2. Frontier in Bioinformatics
